document.full_text: grete waitz, the nine-time winner of the new york city marathon, was remembered as a modest champion and a trailblazer for female runners at a tribute in oslo.
document.title: sports briefing | running: waitz is rememberedin tribute at oslo stadium
lines_and_colors: grete waitz, the nine-time winner of the new york city marathon, was remembered as a modest champion and a trailblazer for female runners at a tribute in oslo.
